text: ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Nimen keyong an la zhi ming qidao, ye keyong “la he man [pu ci zhi zhu]” zhi ming qidao. Wulun nimen yong nage zun ming [zhu] qiqiu ta, yiqie zuimei de mingcheng dou shi ta de.” Ni zai bai zhong ji buyao gao sheng langsong, ye buyao di sheng monian, ni dang zai ci zhi jian caiqu yitiao shizhong zhi dao.
